value.string:
main_name = "%s %s" %(parameter_dict['firstname'], parameter_dict['lastname'])
 site = context.getIntegrationSite()
 person_dict = {}
 
 # First person dict
 for key in ['firstname',
 'lastname',
 'email',
 'id',
 ]:
 person_dict[key] = "%s" %(parameter_dict[key],)
 person_dict["is_delivery"] = True
 
 # Copy the address if not from a company
 if not parameter_dict.get('relation', None):
 # this is the address of the person
 for key in ['cellphone',
 'city',
 'country',
 'fax',
 'phone',
 'street',
 'zip',
 ]:
 person_dict["%s" %key] = parameter_dict.get("shipping_address_%s" %key, '')
 else:
 # Find the gid of the company
 gid_prefix = context.getParentValue().delivered_organisation_module.getGidPrefix("")
 gid_property_list = context.getParentValue().delivered_organisation_module.getGidPropertyList()
 context.log('WebServiceRequest_buildVirtuemartDeliveredPersonBrain, gid_property_list=%s' % gid_property_list)
 gid = [gid_prefix,]
 for prop in gid_property_list:
 if prop == "title":
 gid.append(parameter_dict['relation'])
 elif prop == "country":
 context.log('WebServiceRequest_buildVirtuemartDeliveredPersonBrain, country=%s' % parameter_dict['shipping_address_country'])
 region = site.getCategoryFromMapping(category = 'Country/%s' % parameter_dict['shipping_address_country'],
 create_mapping=True,
 create_mapping_line=True,
 ).split('/', 1)[-1]
 gid.append(region)
 elif prop == "email":
 gid.append(parameter_dict['email'])
 gid = " ".join(gid)
 person_dict["relation"] = gid
 
 brain_list = [brain(context=context,
 object_type=context.getDestinationObjectType(),
 **person_dict),]
 
 return brain_list
